snippet: Paul M. Lewis, the top lawyer on the Democratic staff of the House Armed Services Committee, will fill the position of military envoy for the closing of the Guantánamo Bay prison.
abstract: Pentagon announces that Paul M Lewis will fill new position of military envoy for closing of prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
lead_paragraph: Paul M. Lewis, the top lawyer on the Democratic staff of the House Armed Services Committee, will fill the position of military envoy for the closing of the Guantánamo Bay prison.

headline.main: Pentagon Names Envoy for Guantánamo’s Closing
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Names Envoy For Guantánamo’s Closing
